>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v5/repos/{owner}/{repo}/issues/{number}/pull_requests"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"owner","in":"path","description":"仓库所属空间地址(企业、组织或个人的地址path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"number","in":"path","description":"Issue 编号","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"repo","in":"path","description":"仓库路径(path)","required":true,"example":"","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"mode","in":"query","description":"mode : 0 （默认，不传上面那个参数）， 1（增强模式，传上述参数，返回 pr 的 mergeable 状态）","required":false,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":0}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
